body.p:
Madisonville Ky
May 22d 1865
Hon Thomas E. Bramlette --
Frankfort Ky
Governor --
Enclosed find Petition for release of fine against George W. Utley a citizen of this County together with a recommendation by Hon W. P. Fowler for your Excellencys Executive Clemency &c

Should you be so kind and Equitable in the matter as to release said fine you will please send such release to me as the Petitioner will probably be absent from this County, and ^as he^ has so ordered me to instruct your Excellency --

I am sir very
Respectfully your obt servt
